0.1.1.name: wordpress/todayish-in-history
0.1.1.description:
If your blog posts from the same time of year are relavant each and every year, then this is the plugin for you. Todayish In History shows a list of links to blog posts from your blog which were posted in previous years at about the same date as today.

The plugin is named Todayish because if there isn't a blog post from today's date in previous years it will use the blog post which is the least number of days away from todays date.

Todayish in History provides a function for use in themes as well as a widget for use in your sidebar.
